title: [1508521049] Stubborn Owner Bursts Into Tears When Confronted | Hotel Hell
description:
Hotel guests let the owners know how their stay went, and they are not happy. Gordon asks the owners if they really think they can carry on this way. 

Subscribe for weekly cooking videos.
